prompt: Design a dark-themed account verification page with a sophisticated black background and purple accent colors. Feature a glowing shield icon with a gradient effect at the top. Use white text for the main title 'Account Verification' and light gray for the subtitle. Create four circular input fields with purple borders and dark backgrounds for the verification code entry. Style the verify button with a purple gradient background and white text. Include a 'Didn't receive code?' link in purple at the bottom. Apply neon-like glowing effects to interactive elements and use a modern dark UI aesthetic with proper contrast ratios.
